#labels Phase-Design
This page will introduce the hotkey of keynav.ahk

= Introduction =

keynav on Linux support more powerful function. keynav.ahk just implements the core fun


= Details =

_core_ _hotkey_
  * ctrl+; to enter the selection mode
  * h,j,k,l to select the require region (like VIM)
  * Esc to escape the selection
  * ;(semicolon) move the mouse to the target (mark by the red point)
  * Space left click the target
  * Shift+Space Double click the target
